query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'rider_templates' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user KrGaEuKwKPW5NAp.root --database mP6FLm6cHUyVdEMNViNuZS --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'rider_templates' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	COLUMN_TYPE
id	int(11)
artistId	int(11)
templateName	varchar(255)
technicalRequirements	json
hospitalityRequirements	json
financialTerms	json
createdAt	timestamp
updatedAt	timestamp
